snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo received a $376,667 payment for his book, which has sold only 3,000 hardcover copies. Mayor Bill de Blasio and his wife, Chirlane McCray, also released a return.
abstract: Tax documents reveal that New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo had adjusted gross income of $553,371 in 2014, up sharply from $358,448 in previous year; much of increase can be attributed to advance from his memoir; New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio and wife Chirlane McCray report adjusted gross income of about $217,000.

byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and MATT FLEGENHEIMER
byline.contributor: Jesse McKinley reported from Albany, and Matt Flegenheimer from New York.

lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo received a $376,667 payment for his book, which has sold only 3,000 hardcover copies. Mayor Bill de Blasio and his wife, Chirlane McCray, also released a return.

headline.main: Tax Returns Show Cuomo’s Income Rose in 2014, Largely From Memoir Deal
headline.print_headline: Tax Returns Show Cuomo’s Income Rose in 2014, Largely From Memoir Deal

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: All Things Possible: Setbacks and Success in Politics and Life (Book)
